abstract: A sharp drop in commodity prices triggered a 56.5 percent decrease in first-half profits at BHP Billiton, the world’s largest mining company.
snippet: A sharp drop in commodity prices triggered a 56.5 percent decrease in first-half profits at BHP Billiton, the world’s largest mining company.
lead_paragraph: SYDNEY, Australia  A sharp drop in commodities prices triggered a 56.5 percent decrease in first-half profit at BHP Billiton, the world’s largest mining company, which warned Wednesday of tougher times ahead.

headline.main: BHP Billiton Profit Falls on Lower Metal Prices
headline.print_headline: BHP Billiton Profit Falls on Lower Metal Prices
